Detailed Description

This file declares useful functions and types for the VISHNU list history command.

Author:
Ibrahima Cisse (ibrahima.cisse@sysfera.com)

StringcallBackType &  fUserId,
std::string &  dietConfig,

std::string &  startDateOption,
std::string &  endDateOption 
)

To build options for the VISHNU list history command.

Parameters:
pgName : The name of the command
fUserId,: The user identifier option callback
dietConfig,: Represents the VISHNU config file
fSessionId : The callback for the session identifier
startDateOption,: The start date option
endDateOption,: The end date option
Returns:
The description of all options allowed by the command
